FILE: cm540551v11.0.txt
DYAD: ANGOLA - ZAMBIA
RIVALRY: RIV1146
DISPUTE(S): MID1441 
RIVALRY: RIV1147
DISPUTE(S): MID4303 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20181005
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20181005

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1441 

TERRMID: MID1441 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1441 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1441 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1441 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1441 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID1441 from Gibler 2018, Angola was experiencing a civil war from 1975-1988, and several countries intervened in various ways. Zambia intervened in 1976 and assisted South Africa in their intervention in the war, pulling Zambia into this MID against Angola. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to the Angolan civil war, and Angola lies within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID1441 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1441 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1441 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4303 

TERRMID: MID4303 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4303 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4303 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4303 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4303 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4303 from Gibler 2018, in 2001 Angola repeatedly entered Zambian territory to pursue militarized rebels. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Zambia targeting Angola. Both states lie within this dyad.

CIVWARLINK: MID4303 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4303 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4303 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4303 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4303
rivalry=540551 nationa=ANGOLA nationb=ZAMBIA MID4303 20010107-20011200 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=1-25 DEATHS fatalpa=10 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=USE OF FORCE 

This MID involves repeated incursions into Zambian territory by Angola. The unstable situation is due to rebel activity in the border area. First day of dispute was on 1/7/2001 and last day of dispute was on 12/00/2001.

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
